desc: We are the UKs leading DIY asbestos test kit supplier providing 24hr turn around on all samples. Our testing kits contain everything you need to take and send your sample off, Including: Full PPE, Prepaid Returns, UKAS Lab Results & Easy to follow instructions for Artex, Cement, AIB and many more.

layout.text: Our test kits have been developed to enable a safe, simple and cost effective way of testing suspect material around your home or commercial property.
All our kits come with simple step-by-step instructions, HSE approved PPE, sample bags and pre-paid test at the UKAS approved laboratory.
All orders placed before 2:30pm are despatched on the same day, samples results will usually be available by close of business the day they are received.

1 Kit - 1 Sample - £49.95
                  
                  1 Kit - 2 Samples - £59.95
                  
                  1 Kit - 3 Samples - £69.95
                  
                  1 Kit - 4 Samples - £79.95
